fields.name: CreateMode
fields.description: Indicates whether the configuration store need to be recovered.

fields.name: CreationDate
fields.description: The creation date of configuration store.

fields.name: DisableLocalAuth
fields.description: Disables all authentication methods other than AAD authentication.

fields.name: EnablePurgeProtection
fields.description: Property specifying whether protection against purge is enabled for this configuration store.

fields.name: Encryption
fields.description: The encryption settings of the configuration store.

fields.name: Endpoint
fields.description: The DNS endpoint where the configuration store API will be available.

fields.name: PrivateEndpointConnections
fields.description: The list of private endpoint connections that are set up for this resource.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the configuration store.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: Control permission for data plane traffic coming from public networks while private endpoint is enabled.

fields.name: SoftDeleteRetentionInDays
fields.description: The amount of time in days that the configuration store will be retained when it is soft deleted.
